title: Grubby
summaries: Grubby is one of three critters that occasionally spawn in the Jungle or Underground Jungle biome when a player breaks a background plant, the others being Sluggy (rarer) and Buggy (rarest). Grubby is the most common of the three. Grubby has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

Grubby can be caught with any Bug Net to be carried around in the inventory and released later, or crafted into animated decorative furniture (Grubby Cage). Once crafted, Grubby cannot be released again, unless the furniture item is de-crafted via Shimmer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).
Grubby can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 15% bait power.
Grubby can be spawned by the <linked>Buggy Statue</linked>, however statue-spawned critters cannot be caught with any Bug Net, and will disappear in a puff of smoke when the player attempts to do so.

statistics.Sell: 2 SC50 CC
